UPDATE SYNERGY SET
S_PROJECT_ID= ${projectId} ,
S_USER_ID=${userId},
S_USER_NAME=#{userName},
S_RATIO=#{ratio},
s_update_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE s_id=${synergyId}
mapper.select: SELECT sy.S_CREATE_TIME AS createTime, sy.S_ID AS synergyId, sy.S_PROJECT_ID AS projectId, sy.S_RATIO AS ratio, sy.S_UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, sy.S_USER_ID AS userId, sy.S_USER_NAME AS userName FROM SYNERGY sy LEFT JOIN INDENT_PROJECT ip ON sy.s_project_id = ip.ip_id WHERE ip.ip_state <> 1 AND ip.ip_state <> 2 AND sy.S_ID = ${synergyId}
